pageTitle: Colortone Spider Tie Dye Short Sleeve Tee Shirts - Basketball Equipment and Gear
textBeforeTable: Note: Chest width is on the half so the measurement needs to be doubled for total measurement. Please note there aren't size specs after the tie dye process is done as it will vary. The shrinkage can be up to one full size in some cases. 5.2 oz. 100% open-end cotton Content: - Wash separately - Double-needle cover-seamed neck - Shoulder to shoulder tape - Pre-shrunk Description: Colortone Spider Tie Dye Short Sleeve Tee Shirts Product Description This product is no longer available. If you have any questions about this item, please contact Customer Support. Item #: E73199 Colortone By: Colortone Spider Tie Dye Short Sleeve Tee Shirts
